dimensions: Warp x Weft: 24 x 13 cm (9 7/16 x 5 1/8 in.)
title: Rallo
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: slit tapestry with wrapping, four selvedges
description: Ochre warp with blue, purple, mauve, and brown wefts. The top is woven solidly across, but ends in five long tabs at the bottom. An area of wrapping occurs near the upper left corner.
